title: Simple Namespace resolver for CURIE ids

_id.title: Namespace acronym, corresponds to the namespace part of Curie (ns:id), so it should not contain invalid patterns

_schema.title: The JSON schema absolute URI. It must match the value of 'id' in the JSON schema

pattern.title: The validation pattern to be used. The regex group is used to build the equivalent URL

endpoint.title: URL mask for transforming ids. The URI template must follow RFC 6570, and {id} is replaced by the id part of the canonical CURIE (ns:id)
